channel.title: Non working client with vista (Need help)
channel.description: I have tried a series of things to try and log into a certain private server but I keep getting the same message "Error connecting to server" and the server is up. I have looked all through google, and can't seem to find any answers. I have also tried using "Start Server" on Moparscape.org and it says "couldn't create directory logs". I'm just wondering if anyone has the same problem as me, or does it have something to do with Windows Vista.

item.title: Non working client with vista (Need help)
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

Sounds like you don’t have permission. Log in an administrator account on your PC.

Read full topic
item.source: Non working client with vista (Need help)

item.title: Non working client with vista (Need help)
item.dc:creator: @CKeegan CKeegan
item.description:
@CKeegan wrote:

I think your Firewall might have blocked the 43594 port.
Go to Control Panel > Security > Allow a programme through Windows Firewall.
Click on the Exceptions tab, then click Add Port.

The name can be whatever you want. the port must be 43594 and the protocol must be TCP.

If that doesn’t work it is probably because the client with files isn’t unzipped.

Read full topic
item.source: Non working client with vista (Need help)
